{u'Fn::Join': [u'', [u'#!/bin/bash -ex
', u'cp /var/www/html/wordpress/wp-config-sample.php /var/www/html/wordpress/wp-config.php
', u'sed -i "s/'database_name_here'/'wordpress'/g" wp-config.php
', u'sed -i "s/'username_here'/'wordpress'/g" wp-config.php
', u'sed -i "s/'password_here'/'wordpress'/g" wp-config.php
', u'sed -i "s/'localhost'/'', {u'Fn::GetAtt': [u'Database', u'Endpoint.Address']}, u''/g" wp-config.php
', u'chmod -R 777 wp-content/ 
', u'echo "define('AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID', '', {u'Ref': u'IAMAccessKey'}, u''); " >> wp-config.php 
', u'echo "define('AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY', '', {u'Fn::GetAtt': [u'IAMAccessKey', u'SecretAccessKey']}, u''); " >> wp-config.php 
', u'curl -O https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AWSinAction/builds/gh-pages/phar/wp-cli.phar 
', u'php wp-cli.phar core install --url="', {u'Fn::GetAtt': [u'LoadBalancer', u'DNSName']}, u'/wordpress" --title="', {u'Ref': u'BlogTitle'}, u'" --admin_user="', {u'Ref': u'AdminUsername'}, u'" --admin_password="', {u'Ref': u'AdminPassword'}, u'" --admin_email="', {u'Ref': u'AdminEMail'}, u'" 
', u'php wp-cli.phar plugin install --activate amazon-web-services 
', u'php wp-cli.phar plugin install --activate amazon-s3-and-cloudfront 
', u'CHARCOUNT=`printf "', {u'Ref': u'BlogID'}, u'" | wc -c` 
', u'php wp-cli.phar db query "DELETE FROM wp_options WHERE option_name = 'tantan_wordpress_s3'; INSERT INTO wp_options (option_name, option_value, autoload) VALUES('tantan_wordpress_s3', 'a:15:{s:17:\"post_meta_version\";i:1;s:6:\"bucket\";s:', u'$CHARCOUNT', u':\"', {u'Ref': u'BlogID'}, u'\";s:6:\"region\";s:0:\"\";s:6:\"domain\";s:9:\"subdomain\";s:7:\"expires\";s:1:\"0\";s:10:\"cloudfront\";s:0:\"\";s:13:\"object-prefix\";s:19:\"wp-content/uploads/\";s:10:\"copy-to-s3\";s:1:\"1\";s:13:\"serve-from-s3\";s:1:\"1\";s:17:\"remove-local-file\";s:1:\"0\";s:3:\"ssl\";s:7:\"request\";s:12:\"hidpi-images\";s:1:\"0\";s:17:\"object-versioning\";s:1:\"0\";s:21:\"use-yearmonth-folders\";s:1:\"1\";s:20:\"enable-object-prefix\";s:1:\"1\";}', 'yes');" 
']]}
